name: thank you for the happy place
description:
I got a few sales at my latest work. Maybe, for some of you it was just a normal thing. But it means a lot to me. Sometime ago I was doubting myself, doubting my art, but this community gave me a huge support. I can't thank enough for all your support. I got my confidence back. To believe in my art. It feels really good, knowing someone out there appreciate my work. Thank you so much NFT Community.

Maybe I don't deserve to celebrate anything right now. But I just wanted to say thank you, in the way I know. Sharing the joy I felt. This is my favorite piece of art I’ve ever made.

1000px x 1000px
Looping forever
